title: gTek Global Blockchain Milestone Digest
summary: This digest captures groundbreaking achievements, proposal flows, sub-mint mechanisms, and DAO governance automation in advancing real-world asset tokenization on Solana.

phases.details: Developed CLI-based proposal submission model using solana-tx for DAO-based funding of RWA tokenization initiatives.
Established blueprint for creating Solana Token-2022 permissioned tokens with metadata, compliance logic, and DAO governance layers.
Outlined sub-minting system linked to DAO proposal approval and treasury actions to issue RWA tranche tokens conditionally.
Devised CLI-based instructions to pair RWA tokens with $COLLAT and deploy Raydium-based LPs to activate real-world DeFi liquidity.

phases.phase: Phase 5: Capsule Binding and Vault Integration
phases.details: Created Digestive Capsule NFT with DAO, legal, and funding metadata; linked it to gTek LEX Vault for traceable smart audit execution.

world_record_nominee.category: First HyperDimensional DAO-Linked Sub-Mint Capsule for RWA Tokenization on Solana
world_record_nominee.justification: Combines real asset compliance, automated DAO triggers, NFT audit trail, and LP execution into one CLI-governed protocol stack.
